name: mc7h
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
Hi, I'm Marc (@mc7h) a software engineer and mobile technology specialist based in Manchester. I spend the majority of my time developing software for phones, tablets and other portable devices. I've been fascinated with computers since I was pixel high and consider the Amiga 600 to be the best system ever made. Nowadays, however, I mostly use a Macbook.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
